sentences.english: An old, old ivy vine climbed half way up the brick wall.
sentences.chinese: 一株很老很老的常春藤爬到空牆的半腰處。

sentences.english: So I was in a club called Ivy, which was, uh, the last year,
sentences.chinese: 我參加過一個叫常春藤的俱樂部，呃，那是去年了。

sentences.english: Ivy has crept over the roof.
Using ivy for one ANT task is over-kill.
sentences.chinese: 使用常春藤一個Ant任務結束殺。

sentences.english: Ivy had crept over the ruined castle walls.
sentences.chinese: 常春藤已爬滿了那荒堡殘垣。

sentences.english: A Beijing native, Ulrich earned an Ivy-studded education in the United States.
sentences.chinese: 身爲北京人的李晶在美國常春藤名校接受過高等教育。

sentences.english: Why can't tail calls be optimized in JVM-based Lisps?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼不能在基於JVM的常春藤的尾調用優化？

sentences.english: Not only the fish held still, but the potted ivy lost spirits also.
sentences.chinese: 不僅是魚兒無精打采，連盆栽的常春藤也沒了生氣。

sentences.english: Ivy Harvard University is one of the school.
sentences.chinese: 哈佛大學是常春藤聯校之一。

sentences.english: The wall is covered all over with ivy.
sentences.chinese: 那些常春藤攀援而上，爬滿了整面牆。

sentences.english: Both holly and ivy grow abundantly in temperate climates.
sentences.chinese: 這兩個冬青樹和常春藤在生長十分溫帶氣候。

sentences.english: We are an Ivy League school and we are a really, um, you know, high tier academic institution.
sentences.chinese: 布朗大學屬於常春藤聯盟，是頂尖的學術研究機構。

sentences.english: This ivy was green at a time when other ivies had pooped out.
sentences.chinese: 這棵常春藤在其他常春藤都已凋謝時卻仍然是綠的。

sentences.english: This ivy was green at a time when other ivies had pooped out.
sentences.chinese: 這棵常春藤在其他常春藤都已凋謝時卻仍然是綠的。

sentences.english: Asian-American students have challenged Ivy League admission policies before.
sentences.chinese: 此前亞裔學生也曾挑戰過常春藤盟校的招生政策。

sentences.english: Inspired by nature, the design of this cable wire lock is a mimicry of ivy.
sentences.chinese: 受自然的啓發，這個線纜車鎖是對常春藤的模仿設計。

definition: Boston ivy or Japanese creeper (Parthenocissus tricuspidata)
